column2: Arana: The Heart of the Spider (2005) #11
column6:
Craving revenge on the mysterious man known as Jade, Arana wants to give herself to the hunter-but at what cost? When she loses control, Miguel must find a way to bring her back before she puts everyone she cares about in mortal danger. ,2005,11
32 PGS./T+ SUGGESTED FOR TEENS AND UP ...$2.99
